attributes.action: Call for international enquiry: origin and early reporting of Covid-19 by China.
attributes.additional_details: the Chinese government says such an enquiry is anti Chinese. that is not the case. An objective international enquiry will only show the truth.
attributes.background: It is necessary in order to avoid similar pandemics to learn the lessons from this one.

rejection.details:
World Health Organization (WHO) member states, including the UK, have agreed to set up an independent inquiry into the global response to the coronavirus pandemic and "identify the zoonotic source of the virus and the route of introduction to the human population”.

You can  find out more here:
https://apps.who.int/gb/ebwha/pdf_files/WHA73/A73_R1-en.pdf
